thread.title: Aviott John

author: Aviott John
title: Aviott John
text: I had booked a car in the smallest category, and I got a Honda Civic in very good condition with about 30,000 km on the clock. It was more than adequate on Oman's excellent road network which legally allows a top speed of 120 km/h. I would have liked to have a gps, though, but felt it was overpriced at 4 Omani Rials (US$ 10.50) per day, so I chose to run up a data charge for Google maps on my phone.
